Episodes.Title: Draw Me a House
Episodes.Plot: Louie and Yoko are playing in the garden, but it's about to rain. What can they do? Louie draws a house. The two friends can take shelter, but as soon as the sun comes back out, they can't wait to get back outside and play in the garden.

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Snail
Episodes.Plot: Yoko is in the mood for playing, but it's raining and all the animals have left. Who will play with her now? Louie draws a snail.

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Camel
Episodes.Plot: Louie and Yoko are exhausted by their walk in the desert. How are they going to get to the oasis? Louie draws a camel which gives them a ride to the oasis. The fresh water is so lovely!

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Dog
Episodes.Plot: Louie has lost his scarf. Who can help him to find it? Someone with a good sense of smell! Louie draws a dog. Before finding Louie's scarf, he finds all sorts of things that Louie had lost! What a scatterbrain this Louie!

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Flower
Episodes.Plot: Louie is looking for a beautiful present to give to his mummy. He needs to find something that is pretty and smells nice like his mummy. Louie draws some flowers, but they are too beautiful to be picked.

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Rhinoceros
Episodes.Plot: Louie and Yoko meet a little tic-tic bird who is sad, because he doesn't have any friends. Louie draws a rhinoceros.

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Penguin
Episodes.Plot: Louie and Yoko slide on a frozen lake, but after several falls, they decide that they need an ice-skating teacher. Louie draws a penguin. The penguin teaches them how to skate and gives them a demonstration.

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Dolphin
Episodes.Plot: At the beach, Yoko is too scared of the water to go swimming. Louie wants to help his friend to overcome his fear. Louie draws a dolphin, which helps Yoko to jump into the water: With him, Yoko discovers the pleasures of the water!

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Car
Episodes.Plot: Yoko and Louie are having a race: Yoko, who uses her wings to fly, beats Louie every time. Determined to find a faster way, Louie draws a car. Louie drives his car and succeeds in winning a race.

Episodes.Title: Draw Me a Boat
Episodes.Plot: It's very windy today. What can you do when it is windy? Go sailing! Louie draws a sailing boat. Louie and Yoko climb aboard and navigate the sea.

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Dragon
Episodes.Plot: Louie and Yoko are playing knights and princesses, but they are missing a baddie! Louie draws a dragon who is very enthusiastic - but he's much too kind to play baddies!

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Robot
Episodes.Plot: There are lots of leaves to gather up in the garden today, and Louie and Yoko are in a rush to go and play. How can they finish their work more quickly? Louie draws a robot to help them - then he wants to play as well!

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Rocket
Episodes.Plot: Yoko and Louie see the moon bright in the sky. It's so lovely they want to go there and play. So Louie draws a rocket and they set off on a trip to the moon! The earth is so beautiful seen from above!

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Ostrich
Episodes.Plot: Louie draws an ostrich to help Yoko look for the marbles she has lost in the sand. But first they must scare the bird so that it puts its head in the ground.

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Crocodile
Episodes.Plot: When Louie and Yoko find a lone egg in a nest, Louie realises that he must draw a mummy for it - but what kind of egg is it and what sort of mum should he draw?

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Slide
Episodes.Plot: Louie draws a slide for the small bathing pool that he and Yoko are using so that they can have more fun. They end up having such a great time that Louie's little sister Sophie decides she wants to join in too!

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Chameleon
Episodes.Plot: When Yoko easily keeps finding Louie in a game of hide and seek, Louie decides to draw a chameleon to play with his friend instead - can she discover where a master of disguise is hiding?

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Frog
Episodes.Plot: Louie accidentally throws his ball into the pond and wonders how he can get it back - he needs someone who is nimble and doesn't mind getting wet - a frog!

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Tractor
Episodes.Plot: When Louie and Yoko decide to sow some seeds but find the earth too hard to dig, Louie draws a tractor with a plough to help them with their task, and they are soon able to harvest some delicious vegetables.

Episodes.Title: Louie, Draw Me A Sheep
Episodes.Plot: When Yoko wants to play with the clouds in the sky but cannot catch them, Louie draws her a very soft sheep that looks like a cloud instead. But why won't the sheep let anyone pet it?
